result.arabic_text: يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسَةَ ٱلَّتِي كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ وَلَا تَرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَارِكُمۡ فَتَنقَلِبُواْ خَٰسِرِينَ
result.translation: 21. Dadkaygiiyow (Muslimiinta)! Gala arladaan daahirka ah (Qudus) ee Alle idiin qoray, hana u noqonnina gadaashiinna, waayo markaas waxaad soo laaban idinkoo ku sugan khasaaro dhan.
